casebody.data:
Village of St. Johnsbury v. Harry Dolgin.

January Term, 1930.

Present: Powers, C. J., Slack, Moulton, and Thompson, JJ. Opinion filed February 13, 1930. Shields & Conant for the defendant. Searles, Graves & Waterman for the plaintiff. Thompson, J.

The same question is presented in this case as was presented in the case of Village of St. Johnsbury v. Dolgin, ante page 424, and the judgment there rendered is determinative of this case. Dei the exceptions be dismissed.

On Motion for Rehearing.

The same question is presented in the motion for rehearing in this case as was presented in the motion for a rehearing in *429the case of Tillage of St. Johnsbury v. Dolgin, ante page 424, and the judgment therein rendered is determinative of this case.

Motion overruled. Lei full entry be made.
